thread.section_title: Speke Resort and Conference Centre - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding place
thread.title_full: Outstanding place - Review of Speke Resort and Conference Centre, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Kidde C
title: Outstanding place
text: Resort is well maintained ,greenery all around. Feel fresh air everywhere as its away from town.Conference was well organised. Actually its a well Organised Place,staff are very humble and helpful. Food was delicious with different. Varieties. Swimming pool is Olympic size and clean. Rooms are also well maintained. Will be back soon for holidays with my families.
